document_data.name: Saborn Rendel
document_data.mainbody: '''Saborn Rendel''' was a clockmaker in [[Neverwinter]] and a co-founder of the [[Waterclock Guild]]. He founded it together with [[Lucan Greenharrow]] and made clocks that were both accurate and beautiful.
